scripts.prepare-publish: npm run clean & npm run build & shx cp ./src/@casefabric-typescript-client-package.json ./dist/src/package.json & shx cp -r ./dist/@types/src ./dist/src/@types  & shx cp README.md ./dist/src
scripts.publishLocal: npm run prepare-publish & cd ./dist/src & npm pack
scripts.publishRemote: npm run prepare-publish & cd ./dist/src & npm publish --access public
